sect1.title: SET Command
sect1.para: The SET command is used to set execution property values for the duration of the session.

listitem.para: Both parameter and value must be simple literals - they cannot contain spaces.
The value is also not treated as an expression and will not be evaluated prior to being set as the parameter value.

sect1.para: The SET command can be used to control planning and execution.

listitem.para: SET SHOWPLAN [ON|DEBUG|OFF] - ON returns the query plan along with the results and DEBUG additionally prints the query planner debug information in the log and returns it with the results. Both the plan and the log are available through JDBC API extensions.
SET NOEXEC [ON|OFF] - ON prevents query execution, but parsing and planning will still occur.
